net.kyori.text

Interface Component

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    BlockNbtComponent, BuildableComponent<C,B>, EntityNbtComponent, KeybindComponent, NbtComponent<C,B>, ScopedComponent<C>, ScoreComponent, SelectorComponent, TextComponent, TranslatableComponent
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractComponent

    public interface Component
    A text component.

        Gets the state of a decoration on this component.

        Returns:
        TextDecoration.State#TRUE if this component has the decoration, TextDecoration.State#FALSE if this component does not have the decoration, and TextDecoration.State#NOT_SET if not set
